text: 2:16 Luk 2:34; Jon 9:39; 1 Pita 2:7-8Egha helɨn tuavimɨn zuir darasi, mughuriar kam barazima, an ovever mughuriamɨn mɨn zui. Egha me gamima, me ovei. Ezɨ Godɨn Nguibamɨn tuavimɨn zuir darasi, me mughuriar kam barazima, a mati ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuim isir mughuriam. Egha a ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuim me ganɨdi. Tinara gavgavigh ingangarir kamagh garim damuam? Bar puvatɨ.
